pr_title: HDDS-2854. Add a config for the write chunk executor queue limit.

timeline.message: HDDS-2854. Add a config for the write chunk executor queue limit.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <value>60</value>
          
          
            
                <value>1024</value>
          
      
    
    
  

to be consistent with the code and the description.
timeline.author: adoroszlai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -203,6 +203,15 @@
       will use for writing chunks (60 by default).
     </description>
   </property>
+  <property>
+    <name>dfs.container.ratis.num.write.chunk.executor.queue.limit</name>
+    <value>60</value>

timeline.bodyText: num stands for "number of ..." (eg. in dfs.container.ratis.num.write.chunk.threads it is "number of ... threads").  It seems to be unnecessary in this property name, "... queue limit" seems better than "number of ... queue limit".
timeline.author: adoroszlai

timeline.message: Making the chunk executor blocking queue size same as max pending request limit.
